INSERT INTO IBIMS112B ( CNSB_DCD /* 협의체구분코드 */ , CNSB_SQ , RSLTN_YR /* 결의년도 */ , SN /* 일련번호 */ , DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ , DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래ID */ , GUID /* GUID */ ) VALUES
( #{item.cnsbDcd} /* 협의체구분코드 */ , #{item.sn} /* 일련번호 */ , #{item.rsltnYr} /* 결의년도 */ , #{index}+1 , #{item.dealNo} /* 딜번호 */ , #{item.mtrDcd} /* 안건구분코드 */ , #{item.jdgmDcd} /* 심사구분코드 */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /* 등록일자 */ , '0' /* 삭제여부 */ , SYSDATE /* 조작상세일시 */ , #{item.hndEmpno} /* 조작사원번호 */ , #{item.hndTmnlNo} /* 조작단말기번호 */ , #{item.hndTrId} /* 조작거래ID */ , #{item.guid} /* GUID */ )
mapper.select: SELECT A.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.SN /* 일련번호 */ , B.MTR_NM /* 안건명 */ , A.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R014' AND CD_VL_ID = A.JDGM_DCD ) AS JDGM_DCD_NM , A.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'L007' AND CD_VL_ID = A.MTR_DCD ) AS MTR_DCD_NM , B.DPRT_CD /* 부점코드 */ , ( SELECT MAX(DPRT_NM) FROM IBIMS003B WHERE DPRT_CD = B.DPRT_CD ) AS DPRT_NM , B.CHRG_P_ENO /* 담당자사번 */ , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.CHRG_P_ENO ) AS CHRG_P_ENM , B.OWN_P_ENO /* 심사역사번 */ , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.OWN_P_ENO ) AS OWN_P_ENM FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT OUTER JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{sn} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND B.LAST_YN = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS112B WHERE 1=1 AND CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} /* 협의체구분코드 */ AND CNSB_SQ = #{sn} /* 협의체순번 */ AND RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} /* 결의년도 */ /* 일련번호 */
mapper.select: SELECT A.CNSB_DCD /* 협의체구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I008' AND CD_VL_ID = A.CNSB_DCD ) AS CNSB_DCD_NM , A.RSLTN_YR /* 결의년도 */ , A.CNSB_SQ /* 협의체순번 */ , A.SN /* 일련번호 */ , A.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , A.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , B.MTR_NM /* 안건명 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD )||' ('|| B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD || ')' AS PTFD_CRNCY_CD_NM , B.PTFD_AMT /* 부의금액 */ , C.CNSB_OPN_DT /* 협의체개최일자 */ , C.CNSB_OPN_TM /* 협의체개최시각 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D010' AND CD_VL_ID = B.DPRT_CD ) ||' ('|| B.DPRT_CD || ')' AS DPRT_NM , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.CHRG_P_ENO )|| ' ('|| B.CHRG_P_ENO || ')' AS CHRG_P_ENM , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.OWN_P_ENO ) || ' (' || B.OWN_P_ENO || ')' AS OWN_P_ENM , B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD /* 안건진행상태구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND CD_VL_ID = B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ) AS MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD_NM FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND B.LAST_YN = '1' LEFT JOIN IBIMS111B C ON A.CNSB_DCD = C.CNSB_DCD AND A.CNSB_SQ = C.SN AND A.RSLTN_YR = C.RSLTN_YR WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{cnsbSq} AND B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD >= 304

SELECT B.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , B.MTR_NM /* 안건명 */ , B.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , B.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R014' AND CD_VL_ID = B.JDGM_DCD ) AS JDGM_DCD_NM , B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD /* 부의통화코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD ) || ' (' || B.PTFD_CRNCY_CD || ')' AS PTFD_CRNCY_CD_NM , B.PTFD_AMT /* 부의금액 */ , B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD /* 안건진행상태구분코드 */ , CASE WHEN B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '304' THEN '' ELSE ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND CD_VL_ID = B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ) END AS MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD_NM , NVL(A.APVL_AMT, '') AS APVL_AMT /* 승인금액 */ , NVL(A.SDN_CNDT_F, '') AS SDN_CNDT_F /* 셀다운조건여부 */ , NVL(A.SDN_CNDT_CTNS, '') AS SDN_CNDT_CTNS /* 셀다운조건의견 */ , NVL(A.ETC_CNDT_F, '') AS ETC_CNDT_F /* 기타조건여부 */ , NVL(A.ETC_CNDT_CTNS, '') AS ETC_CNDT_CTNS /* 기타조건의견 */ , B.RISK_RCG_NO /* 리스크승인번호 */ , C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD /* 결의결과코드 */ , NVL(( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'R025' AND CD_VL_ID = C.RSLTN_RSLT_CD ), '') AS RSLTN_RSLT_CD_NM , A.SN , A.CNSB_DCD , A.CNSB_SQ FROM IBIMS112B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B B ON A.DEAL_NO = B.DEAL_NO AND A.MTR_DCD = B.MTR_DCD AND A.JDGM_DCD = B.JDGM_DCD AND B.LAST_YN = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '307' THEN '4' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '308' THEN '2' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '309' AND ETC_CNDT_F = 'N' THEN '1' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '309' AND ETC_CNDT_F = 'Y' THEN '3' WHEN MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD = '306' THEN '5' ELSE '' END AS RSLTN_RSLT_CD , CNSB_DCD , CNSB_SQ , RSLTN_YR , SN FROM IBIMS112B ) C ON A.CNSB_DCD = C.CNSB_DCD AND A.CNSB_SQ = C.CNSB_SQ AND A.RSLTN_YR = C.RSLTN_YR AND A.SN = C.SN WHERE A.CNSB_DCD = #{cnsbDcd} AND A.CNSB_SQ = #{cnsbSq} AND A.RSLTN_YR = #{rsltnYr} AND A.SN = #{sn}

SELECT IBIMS112B.CNSB_DCD /* 협의체구분코드 */ , IBIMS112B.CNSB_SQ /* 협의체순번(회차) */ , IBIMS112B.RSLTN_YR /* 결의년도 */ , IBIMS112B.SN /* 일련번호(순서정보) */ , IBIMS112B.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , IBIMS112B.MTR_DCD /* 안건구분코드 */ , IBIMS112B.JDGM_DCD /* 심사구분코드 */ , IBIMS112B.RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ , IBIMS112B.SDN_CNDT_F /* 셀다운조건여부 */ , IBIMS112B.SDN_CNDT_CTNS /* 셀다운조건의견 */ , IBIMS112B.ETC_CNDT_F /* 기타조건여부 */ , IBIMS112B.ETC_CNDT_CTNS /* 기타조건의견 */ , IBIMS112B.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD /* 안건진행상태구분코드 */ , IBIMS112B.APVL_AMT /* 승인금액 */ , IBIMS112B.APVL_DT /* 승인일자 */ , IBIMS112B.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , IBIMS112B.HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , IBIMS112B.HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , IBIMS112B.HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , IBIMS112B.HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래ID */ , IBIMS112B.GUID /* GUID */ , IBIMS103B.CHRG_P_ENO AS CHRG_P_ENO , A.EMP_NM AS CHRG_P_ENM , IBIMS103B.OWN_P_ENO AS OWN_P_ENO , B.EMP_NM AS OWN_P_ENM FROM IBIMS112B , IBIMS103B , IBIMS003B A , IBIMS003B B WHERE 1=1 AND IBIMS112B.DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} AND IBIMS112B.MTR_DCD = #{mtrDcd} AND IBIMS112B.JDGM_DCD = #{jdgmDcd} AND IBIMS112B.DEAL_NO = IBIMS103B.DEAL_NO AND IBIMS112B.MTR_DCD = IBIMS103B.MTR_DCD AND IBIMS112B.JDGM_DCD = IBIMS103B.JDGM_DCD AND IBIMS103B.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.EMPNO = IBIMS103B.CHRG_P_ENO AND B.EMPNO = IBIMS103B.OWN_P_ENO
